titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Middle Level Education Month.
Supporting the goals and ideals of National Middle Level Education Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
This resolution expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Middle Level Education Month.
The resolution (1) recognizes the importance of middle level education and the contributions of those who educate this unique age group, and (2) encourages people to observe such month by visiting and celebrating schools that are responsible for educating the nation's young adolescents.
